subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova beat Mara Santangelo of Italy, 6-1, 6-2, in Moscow yesterday to move Russia within one victory of winning its third Fed Cup title. Kuznetsova’s victory put Russia ahead, 2-0, going into today’s reverse singles and doubles in the best-of-five format. Anna Chakvetadze struggled past Francesca Schiavone, 6-4, 4-6, 6-4, in the opener.
